trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som håndterer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>eller andre serverkontroll flyttes i sin egen sone, eller til en annen sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje både når en bruker drar en kontroll, og når det er en programmatisk flytting.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>denne hendelsen oppstår ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>metoden, og den gir mulighet til å avbryte glidende prosessen før den er fullført.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flyttingen er fullført og kontrollen er plassert i en ny plassering og, denne hendelsen etterfølges av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartMovingEventHandler delegate will be called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som er angitt i WebPartMovingEventHandler representanten skal kalles når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartMoving` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Siden utviklere kan opprette en egendefinert behandlingsprogram for hendelsen ved å legge til den `OnWebPartMoving` attributt til den `<asp:webpartmanager>` elementet, og tilordne en egendefinert navn for attributtet.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Et egendefinert behandlingsprogram kan også tilordnes programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du tilordner programmatisk hendelsesbehandling [NIB: slik: koble denne hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet metoder på hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
